text: Philippe Périlleux (born 16 September 1963) is a retired French football midfielder.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:French footballers Category:Valenciennes FC players Category:Lille OSC players Category:Montpellier HSC players Category:USL Dunkerque players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Ligue 1 players
title: Philippe Périlleux
